discussion.title: Partial Least Squares & PySR
discussion.body:
I wanted to ask if anyone has seen an implementation of Partial Least Squares and Symbolic Regression. They seem to be a great fit. This is especially true for small datasets with high dimensionality.  

I would love to hear back on this from someone.

nodes.body: Sorry not sure why I didn't see this post. For others looking at this discussion, you can check out the `full_objective` parameter in PySR or the `loss_function` in SymbolicRegression.jl - it lets you define an arbitrary objective function.
